db:abstract.db:para: Set of variables to specify the path to Qt for Android for the corresponding ABI.

db:article.db:para: Set of variables to specify the path to Qt for Android for the corresponding ABI.
This variable was introduced in Qt 6.3.

db:note.db:para: This variable is in technology preview and may change in future releases.
This variable is used only if targeting the Android platform.

db:article.db:para: Each variable can be used to specify the path to Qt for Android for the corresponding ABI. The supported ABIs are armeabi-v7a, arm64-v8a, x86, x86_64.
